Structs/ClassifierResultItem.html#/s:6Ar.name: score
Structs/ClassifierResultItem.html#/s:6Ar.abstract: The match probability score for the result, in the range of 0.0 to 1.0 (0% match to 100% match).
Result items are considered equal if they have matching name values.

Structs/ClassifierResultItem.html.name: ClassifierResultItem

Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.abstract: Determine whether the given coordinate is inside the classifier’s geographical region.

Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.name: isStale
Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.abstract: Whether the classifier’s model data is old enough to justify requesting a new classifier with fresh model data.

Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.name: coverageScore
Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.abstract: Coverage Score is the result of completenessScore * accuracyScore, in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.

Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.name: accuracyScore
Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.abstract: Accuracy Score is the expected minimum accuracy of the clasifier’s results, in the range of 0.0 to 1.0.

Classes/ActivityTypeClassifier.html#/s:6.name: completenessScore

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: date
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The timestamp for the weighted centre of the sample period. Equivalent to location.timestamp.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: location
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The sample’s smoothed location, equivalent to the weighted centre of the sample’s filteredLocations.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: rawLocations
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The raw locations received over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: filteredLocations
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The Kalman filtered locations recorded over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: movingState
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The moving or stationary state for the sample. See MovingState for details on possible values.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: stepHz
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The user’s walking/running/cycling cadence (steps per second) over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: courseVariance
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The degree of variance in course direction over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: xyAcceleration
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The average amount of accelerometer motion on the XY plane over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: zAcceleration
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The average amount of accelerometer motion on the Z axis over the sample duration.

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: coreMotionActivityType
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: The highest scoring Core Motion activity type

Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.name: timeOfDay
Classes/LocomotionSample.html#/s:6ArcKit.abstract: A convenience getter for the sample’s time interval since start of day.
